description:
Isoland draws players in with its original setting and visuals. Itâ€™s an adventure game with tons of puzzle elements. Players play an investigator who arrive at a mystical island floating somewhere in the Atlantic to uncover its secrets. There lies a mysterious factor and pyramid filled with puzzles.

The most anticipated independent puzzle game of 2017 nominated for ""Best Art"" at the IndiePlay Awards.

Game Features
- Original setting plus cute and surreal island dwellers 
- Lots of puzzle elements
- Achievements
- Hidden ending
name: Isoland
